CustomField.formula: IF (OR(ISPICKVAL(Function__c,"")), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif" , 'Yellow' ,12,12) & ' Function is not selected. Please update the value.' & BR(), NULL) & IF (OR(MailingCountry=""), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif" , 'Yellow' ,12,12) & ' Country is not selected. Please update the value.' & BR(), NULL) & IF (OR(Email=""), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif" , 'Yellow' ,12,12) & ' Email is not selected. Please update the value.' & BR(), NULL) & IF (OR(MobilePhone=""), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif" , 'Yellow' ,12,12) & ' Mobile is not added. Please update the value.' & BR(), NULL)
CustomField.label: Alerts
